duties_responsibilities.duty: Educate homeowners on the benefits of solar energy and available incentives.
Assess client energy needs and evaluate the feasibility of solar installations in their roof and home.
Use our software to design customized solar energy systems and prepare detailed proposals.
Explain customers financial analysis, including cost estimates, savings potential, and return on investment.
Negotiate contracts and close sales and maintain customer relationships for satisfaction.
Coordinate with solar installation companies and ensure project completion on schedule.
